author: vargasa
body:
#### PR description:

Progress on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31143. See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31307#issuecomment-685423687

#### PR validation:

```
$ cmsRun SimG4Core/Configuration/test/dd4hep_ZMM_Run3_Step1_cfg.py
```


`master` (dd4hep) lead us to:
```
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus_1/PixelBarrelHybridFull_1
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus_1/PixelBarrelCapacitorStripFull_1
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus_1/PixelBarrelCapacitorStripFull_2
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus_1/PixelBarrelMountClipFull_1
```
`DDCMS/Core` (reference) lead us to:
```
CmsTrackerLevelbuilder<DDFilteredView>::build/cms:OCMS[0]/cms:CMSE[1]/tracker:Tracker[1]/pixbar:PixelBarrel[1]/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelLadderFull0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelSensorFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelActiveFull0[1]
CmsTrackerLevelbuilder<DDFilteredView>::build/cms:OCMS[0]/cms:CMSE[1]/tracker:Tracker[1]/pixbar:PixelBarrel[1]/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelLadderFull0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus[2]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelSensorFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelActiveFull0[1]
CmsTrackerLevelbuilder<DDFilteredView>::build/cms:OCMS[0]/cms:CMSE[1]/tracker:Tracker[1]/pixbar:PixelBarrel[1]/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelLadderFull0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus[3]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelSensorFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelActiveFull0[1]
CmsTrackerLevelbuilder<DDFilteredView>::build/cms:OCMS[0]/cms:CMSE[1]/tracker:Tracker[1]/pixbar:PixelBarrel[1]/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelLadderFull0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus[4]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelSensorFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelActiveFull0[1]
CmsTrackerLevelbuilder<DDFilteredView>::build/cms:OCMS[0]/cms:CMSE[1]/tracker:Tracker[1]/pixbar:PixelBarrel[1]/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelLadderFull0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleFullPlus[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelSensorFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelActiveFull0[1]
CmsTrackerLevelbuilder<DDFilteredView>::build/cms:OCMS[0]/cms:CMSE[1]/tracker:Tracker[1]/pixbar:PixelBarrel[1]/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelLadderFull0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleFullPlus[2]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelSensorFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelActiveFull0[1]
CmsTrackerLevelbuilder<DDFilteredView>::build/cms:OCMS[0]/cms:CMSE[1]/tracker:Tracker[1]/pixbar:PixelBarrel[1]/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelLadderFull0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleFullPlus[3]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelSensorFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelActiveFull0[1]
CmsTrackerLevelbuilder<DDFilteredView>::build/cms:OCMS[0]/cms:CMSE[1]/tracker:Tracker[1]/pixbar:PixelBarrel[1]/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelLadderFull0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelModuleFullPlus[4]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelSensorFull[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelActiveFull0[1]
CmsTrackerLevelbuilder<DDFilteredView>::build/cms:OCMS[0]/cms:CMSE[1]/tracker:Tracker[1]/pixbar:PixelBarrel[1]/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0[1]/pixbarladderfull0:PixelBarrelLadderFull0[1]
...
```

 `thisPR` (dd4hep) lead us to:
```
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus_1/PixelBarrelSensorFull_1/PixelBarrelActiveFull0_1
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus_2/PixelBarrelSensorFull_1/PixelBarrelActiveFull0_1
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus_3/PixelBarrelSensorFull_1/PixelBarrelActiveFull0_1
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullMinus_4/PixelBarrelSensorFull_1/PixelBarrelActiveFull0_1
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullPlus_1/PixelBarrelSensorFull_1/PixelBarrelActiveFull0_1
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullPlus_2/PixelBarrelSensorFull_1/PixelBarrelActiveFull0_1
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullPlus_3/PixelBarrelSensorFull_1/PixelBarrelActiveFull0_1
/OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelBarrel_1/pixbarlayer0:PixelBarrelLayer0_1/PixelBarrelLadderFull0_1/PixelBarrelModuleBoxFull_1/PixelBarrelModuleFullPlus_4/PixelBarrelSensorFull_1/PixelBarrelActiveFull0_1
...
```
title: DD4hep: CmsTrackerLevelBuilder Fix Tracker Geometry Navigation
